LanguageData.MakeVegetables.label: cook fried assorts
LanguageData.MakeVegetables.description: Prepares a simple dried assortment of vegetables. Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakeVegetables_Bulk.label: cook fried assorts (x4)
LanguageData.MakeVegetables_Bulk.description: Prepares a simple dried assortment of vegetables. Produces 4.
LanguageData.MakeFriedMushrooms.label: cook fried cave mushrooms

LanguageData.CookScrambledEggs.label: cook scrambled eggs
LanguageData.CookScrambledEggs_Bulk.label: cook scrambled eggs (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealSalad.label: cook fruit salad
LanguageData.CookMealSalad.description: Prepares a fruit salad made from raw fruits. Produces 1.
LanguageData.CookMealSalad_Bulk.label: cook fruit salads (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealSalad_Bulk.description: Prepares fruit salads made from raw fruits. Produces 4.
LanguageData.CookRoastedMeat.label: cook roasted meat
LanguageData.CookRoadMeatx4.label: cook roasted meat (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealFine.label: cook fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Produces 2.
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Veg.label: cook vegetarian fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Veg.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from plant ingredients. Produces 2.
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Meat.label: cook carnivore fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Meat.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from meat ingredients. Produces 2.
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Bulk.label: cook fine meals (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealFine_Bulk.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Produces 8.
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk_Veg.label: cook vegetarian fine meal (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk_Veg.description: Cook somewhat complex meals from plant ingredients. Some of the ingredients are wasted in order to create a good eating experience. Producing varied flavors with plants alone introduces extra inefficiencies. Produces 8.
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk_Meat.label: cook carnivore fine meal (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealFineBulk_Meat.description: Cook somewhat complex meals from meat ingredients. Some of the ingredients are wasted in order to create a good eating experience. Producing varied flavors with meat alone introduces extra inefficiencies. Produces 8.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.label: cook lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Produces 2.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Veg.label: cook vegetarian lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Veg.description: Cook a very complex meal from plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. Producing varied flavors with plants alone introduces extra inefficiencies. Produces 2.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Meat.label: cook carnivore lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Meat.description: Cook a very complex meal from meat ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. Producing varied flavors with meat alone introduces extra inefficiencies. Produces 2.
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Bulk.label: cook lavish meals (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealLavish_Bulk.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Produces 8.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk_Veg.label: cook vegetarian lavish meal (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk_Veg.description: Cook very complex meals from plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. Producing varied flavors with plants alone introduces extra inefficiencies. Produces 8.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk_Meat.label: cook carnivore lavish meal (x4)
LanguageData.CookMealLavishBulk_Meat.description: Cook very complex meals from meat ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted in order to create the best eating experience. Producing varied flavors with meat alone introduces extra inefficiencies. Produces 8.
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.label: cook packaged survival meal
LanguageData.CookMealSurvival.description: Cooks a packaged survival meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.Make_Pemmican.label: make pemmican
LanguageData.Make_Pemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a long time without refrigeration.
LanguageData.Make_PemmicanBulk.label: make pemmican x4
LanguageData.Make_PemmicanBulk.description: Make bulk pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a long time without refrigeration.
